You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

Dataset: webnlg

Output:
final_response: Alan Shepard was born on November 18, 1923, in New Hampshire. In 1963, he served as Chief of the Astronaut Office and later participated in the Apollo 14 mission. He passed away in California.
